name: InsightsPanel
functionalRequirements:
## Insights Panel

### Purpose
Display actionable insights and recommendations.

### Features
- AI-generated recommendations
- Priority ranking
- Action items
- Success metrics

dataRequirements.description: Receives insights and recommendations from parent

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- insights: Array of insight items
- priority: Priority filter
- onActionClick: Action handler
